dcterms:creator: Dan Jurafsky
Elizabeth Shriberg
Debra Bicasa
dcterms:description: The Switchboard Dialog Act (SWDA) dataset consists of telephone conversations that have been manually segmented into turns and utterances, annotated with dialog acts using the DAMSL labeling scheme. It contains approximately 1.4 million words and is widely used for dialog act recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: Switchboard Dialog Act (SWDA)

dcterms:creator: Elizabeth Shriberg
Raj Dhillon
Sonali Bhagat
Jeremy Ang
Hannah Carvey
dcterms:description: The Meeting Recorder Dialog Act (MRDA) dataset is a corpus of 75 meetings that took place at the International Computer Science Institute (ICSI). It includes conversations with more than two speakers and features a different dialog act labeling scheme compared to SWDA, with a total of approximately 850,000 words.
dcterms:title: Meeting Recorder Dialog Act (MRDA)
